Package game.Bricks

Class Brick

java.lang.Object
game.Bricks.Brick
Direct Known Subclasses:
CementBrick, ClayBrick, CrystalBrick, SteelBrick
public abstract class Brick
extends java.lang.Object

Brick Abstract Class

This Class is used to manage the Brick properties
Version:
0.1
Author:
Mustafa Mehmood

  • Constructor Details

    • Brick

      public Brick​(java.lang.String name, java.awt.Point pos, java.awt.Dimension size, java.awt.Color border, java.awt.Color inner, int strength)
      Constructor method of Brick which sets values of some fields , initializes some objects and calls methods required for brick.
      Parameters:
      name - String Set name of brick
      pos - Point obj to set point of brick
      size - Dimension obj to set size of brick
      border - Color obj to set color of border
      inner - color obj to set color of brick
      strength - Int to set the strength ie the number of hits it can take before breaking
